Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Friend}},
Adoption of solar power is skyrocketing! Did you know the demand for solar is going to increase to over 1.5 million homes in 2017?
Your business already provides a valuable service for home owners. As a Referral Partner of Direct Energy Solar, you can help your customers save money on one of their highest monthly expenses by sharing your solar opportunity with them. When one of your customers decides to go solar, they will have decades of potential electricity savings that YOU helped them discover. What a great way to ensure they will continue to do business with you for the long term and refer you to their friends and family. Both our companies will benefit from our relationship.
Remember that you don’t have to sell solar – just provide referrals! It takes only minutes of conversation with a customer to get them excited about going solar.
Let me help you reach your solar goals: • We will do all the marketing and selling • Risk-free for your business • Simple online portal to input leads and track your revenue
Become a Referral Partner <http://partners.directenergysolar.com/roof> for Direct Energy Solar today!
Suzanne Borneman Sr. Manager, Field Marketing 240-278-8616 suzanne.borneman@directenergysolar.com <mailto:suzanne.borneman@directenergysolar.com>

You are receiving this email because you could benefit from the Direct Energy Solar Partner Program.
You will be paid $150 per qualified lead and $750 per each sale. A qualified lead is a prospect that agrees to a roof evaluation by Direct Energy Solar and has not been disqualified in Direct Energy Solar’s qualification process.

We customize our solar power system specifically for your home, therefore, pricing, savings, utility bill, solar bill amounts and actual returns vary based on different factors including but not limited to your location, system size, available solar incentives and local utility rates.
